column4: I'm running ubuntu 8.10 and i can't seem to get it to see my rt2870 USB. i've tried blacklisting rt2800usb and sta .. modprobe gives me nothing
regardless of version i still have the issue and its the same with all ubuntu versions i've tried.
8.10 is not supported anymore
have you tried with 10.04?
so if you modprobe rt2870sta it is not in lsmod?
no
can i see the lsusb?
Bus 001 Device 005: ID 050d:935a Belkin Components F6D4050 N150 Enhanced Wireless Network Adapter v1000 [Ralink RT2870]
linux-firmware is installed?
linux-firmware is already the newest version.
i just tried inserting it. i run 10.10. no problems.
are you sure it isn't blacklisted?
i blacklisted 2800usb and sta
why?
i can't find 2800sta
correct.
i don't understand why you can't insert the module via modprobe. look into dmesg. maybe it will tell you sth. useful
well there you go. that's the problem
yes the modules not found but the drivers wont compile under ubuntu 8.10
8.10 isn't supported anymore.
i won't help you anymore sry.
